EmailTemplate.name: Nomex® Paper (DPTH)
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont Reply: Inquiry Forwarded to BRENNTAG INGREDIENTS (THAILAND) PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our product, Nomex® Paper.
Please be informed that your inquiry has already been forwarded to our distributor:
BRENNTAG INGREDIENTS (THAILAND) PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED
Att: Khun Oranuch PORNTHANALERT
Email : oranuch.pornthanalert@brenntag-asia.com
1168/98-100 Lumpini Tower 33rd Floor, Rama IV Road, Thungmahamek, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120 Thailand
Phone +66 2 689 5999
Fax +66 2 689 5888-9
email info-thai@brenntag-asia.com
http://www.brenntag-asiapacific.com/en/pages/Brenntag_Asia_Pacific/Locations/Thailand/index.html
Please be informed that your inquiry has already been forwarded to our expert. The process normally takes between 24-48 hours to process. Please kindly wait for the contact.
Again, thank you for contacting DuPont and we hope to be at your service again in the future.
Warm Regards, DuPont Inquiry Management Center, Asia Pacific
